author: Micky-kun
description: A fully functioning clock for your Discord server.
install_msg: âœ… **Thanks for installing Chronos Delta to your bot.** Run `[p]time` to show your server's current time. Use `[p]settimezone server` to set a time zone.
short: A fully functioning clock for your Discord server.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs in case a user sets a timezone for themselves. They can remove it by simply running '[p]settimezone user' as is.
